Title: Inches
Plot: Tommy attempts to handle the insanity of his father while defending Colleen's new lifestyle to Janet. At the firehouse, Sean and Mike the Probie unknowingly launch a full blown wager among the crew.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Aria Pullman,  Jessica Blank,  Larisa Polonsky,  Brittany Slattery,  Kelly Deadmon,  Natalie Distler,  Shavonne Conroy,  Kevin Hagan,  Jack McCormack,  Michael Carlsen,  Mackenzie Connolly,  Jarah,  William Ston
